subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant scored 35 points and Serge Ibaka had 16 as the visiting Oklahoma City Thunder held off a furious Cleveland comeback for a 102-95 win over the Cavaliers.
snippet: Kevin Durant scored 35 points and Serge Ibaka had 16 as the visiting Oklahoma City Thunder held off a furious Cleveland comeback for a 102-95 win over the Cavaliers.
